name: Ødel
description:
Ødel is a game that I was able to develop during my second year of study within a team of 5 peoples. During the production of our project, I was able to participate in the Game Design part of the game including the lore, the story, as well as the universe of it and its dialogues. I was also able to be in charge of the development of the different levels of the game as well as responsible for the Sound Design and the interfaces as well as the navigation through them.

Credits : 3D Modeling : DEJEAN Antoine, FAVRE Steven, GAUDICHON Erwan Animation : AUDEON Yvain Programmation & Integration : DEJEAN Antoine Level Design : FAVRE Steven, CADORET Titouan Game Design : FAVRE Steven, AUDEON Yvain, CADORET Titouan UI & UX Design : CADORET Titouan Sound Design : CADORET Titouan
